manifest.name: @noble/hashes
manifest.description: Audited & minimal 0-dependency JS implementation of SHA2, SHA3, RIPEMD, BLAKE2/3, HMAC, HKDF, PBKDF2, Scrypt

scripts.build: npm run build:clean; tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build:release: cd build; npm i; npm run build
